name: Braintrust
introduce: Braintrust is a decentralized talent network that connects skilled, vetted knowledge workers with the world’s leading companies. Braintrust’s mission is to build the world’s most impactful talent network — one that is user-owned, aligns incentives, and redistributes value to Talent and Organizations.Users earn BTRST token by introducing and onboarding clients (demand) and talent (supply) to the network. In addition, clients use BTRST to enhance their job postings and talent uses BTRST to enhance their proposals or take courses to level up their skills.
